import { PiBookOpenTextLight } from 'react-icons/pi' import { AiOutlineClose, AiOutlineEdit } from 'react-icons/ai' import { BsInfoCircle } from 'react-icons/bs' import { MdOutlineDelete } from 'react-icons/md' import { BiUserCircle } from 'react-icons/bi' function BookModel({ book, onClose }) { return (
event.stopPropagation()} className='w-[600px] max-w-full h-[400px] bg-white rounded-xl p-4 flex flex-col relative'>

{book.publishYear}

{book._id}

{book.title}

{book.author}

Short discription of book

Long discription of book

) } export default BookModel
